marklogic.body:
of course they wouldn't have the same response. If the victim were white, the racist lefty loon-a-Tics would be clapping & Cheering. Oh, and don't forget that the race-baiting kings, Jesse Blackson & Al Not-So-Sharpton wouldn't crawl out from their cellars like the rats they are.
Oh, and how can we forget - we wouldn't have the Great Divider stating that the victim would look like his son. He might say that the victim might look like a "typical white person" (remember when he threw his gramma under the bus & called her that)?
